page.title: 04ALL SAINTS CHURCH - 1980s
page.content:
{MARRIAGES During the first five years of this decade there were only eighteen marriages in Nailstone Church. {FUNERALS} In the same period there have been nineteen funerals. {BAPTISMS} There were thirty baptism during this time.
The average cost of a{funeral service} in 1985 is Â£20, flowers, organist and choir are all at extra cost.
The basic{marriage}ceremony is Â£32 with the same extras including the ringing of the bells.
There is no charge for{baptism} although the certificate costs Â£1
